verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to me again,<WH559> saying,

What do you mean,<WH4911> that you use this proverb<WH4912> concerning the land<WH127> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> The fathers<WH1> have eaten<WH398> sour grapes,<WH1155> and the children<WH1121>'s teeth<WH8127> are set on edge?<WH6949>
As I live,<WH2416> says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh,<WH3069> you shall not have occasion any more to use<WH4911> this proverb<WH4912> in Israel.<WH3478>
Behold,<WH5315> all souls are mine;<WH5315> as the soul of the father,<WH1> so also the soul<WH5315> of the son<WH1121> is mine:<WH5315> the soul who sins,<WH2398> he shall die.<WH4191>
But if a man<WH376> is just,<WH6662> and does<WH6213> that which is lawful<WH4941> and right,<WH6666>

and has not eaten<WH398> on the mountains,<WH2022> neither has lifted up<WH5375> his eyes<WH5869> to the idols<WH1544> of the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> neither has defiled<WH2930> his neighbor<WH7453>'s wife,<WH802> neither has come near<WH7126> to a woman<WH802> in her impurity,<WH5079>

and has not wronged<WH3238> any,<WH376> but has restored<WH7725> to the debtor<WH2326> his pledge,<WH2258> has taken<WH1497> nothing by robbery,<WH1500> has given<WH5414> his bread<WH3899> to the hungry,<WH7457> and has covered<WH3680> the naked<WH5903> with a garment;<WH899>

he who has not given forth<WH5414> on interest,<WH5392> neither has taken<WH3947> any increase,<WH8636> who has withdrawn<WH7725> his hand<WH3027> from iniquity,<WH5766> has executed<WH6213> true<WH571> justice<WH4941> between man<WH376> and man,<WH376>

has walked<WH1980> in my statutes,<WH2708> and has kept<WH8104> my ordinances,<WH4941> to deal<WH6213> truly;<WH571> he is just,<WH6662> he shall surely<WH2421> live,<WH2421> says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh.<WH3069>
If he fathers<WH3205> a son<WH1121> who is a robber,<WH6530> a shedder<WH8210> of blood,<WH1818> and who does<WH6213> any<WH251> one of these things,<WH259>
and who does<WH6213> not any of those duties,<WH398> but even has eaten on the mountains,<WH2022> and defiled<WH2930> his neighbor<WH7453>'s wife,<WH802>

has wronged<WH3238> the poor<WH6041> and needy,<WH34> has taken<WH1497> by robbery,<WH1500> has not restored<WH7725> the pledge,<WH2258> and has lifted up<WH5375> his eyes<WH5869> to the idols,<WH1544> has committed<WH6213> abomination,<WH8441>

has given forth<WH5414> on interest,<WH5392> and has taken<WH3947> increase;<WH8636> shall he then live?<WH2425> he shall not live:<WH2421> he has done<WH6213> all these abominations;<WH8441> he shall surely<WH4191> die;<WH4191> his blood shall be on him.<WH1818>
Now,<WH3205> behold, if he fathers a son,<WH1121> who sees<WH7200> all his father<WH1>'s sins,<WH2403> which he has done,<WH6213> and fears,<WH7200> and does<WH6213> not such like;<WH2004>

who has not eaten<WH398> on the mountains,<WH2022> neither has lifted up<WH5375> his eyes<WH5869> to the idols<WH1544> of the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> has not defiled<WH2930> his neighbor<WH7453>'s wife,<WH802>

neither has wronged<WH3238> any,<WH376> has not<WH2254> taken anything to pledge,<WH2258> neither has taken<WH1497> by robbery,<WH1500> but has given<WH5414> his bread<WH3899> to the hungry,<WH7457> and has covered<WH3680> the naked<WH5903> with a garment;<WH899>

who has withdrawn<WH7725> his hand<WH3027> from the poor,<WH6041> who has not received<WH3947> interest<WH5392> nor increase,<WH8636> has executed<WH6213> my ordinances,<WH4941> has walked<WH1980> in my statutes;<WH2708> he shall not die<WH4191> for the iniquity<WH5771> of his father,<WH1> he shall surely<WH2421> live.<WH2421>

As for his father,<WH1> because he cruelly<WH6233> oppressed,<WH6231> robbed<WH1497> <WH1499> his brother,<WH251> and did<WH6213> that which is not good<WH2896> among<WH8432> his people,<WH5971> behold,<WH4191> he shall die in his iniquity.<WH5771>

Yet you say,<WH559> Why doesn't<WH1121> the son bear<WH5375> the iniquity<WH5771> of the father?<WH1> When the son<WH1121> has done<WH6213> that which is lawful<WH4941> and right,<WH6666> and has kept<WH8104> all my statutes,<WH2708> and has done<WH6213> them,<WH2421> he shall surely live.<WH2421>

The soul<WH5315> who sins,<WH2398> he shall die:<WH4191> the son<WH1121> shall not bear<WH5375> the iniquity<WH5771> of the father,<WH1> neither shall the father<WH1> bear<WH5375> the iniquity<WH5771> of the son;<WH1121> the righteousness<WH6666> of the righteous<WH6662> shall be on him,<WH7564> and the wickedness of the wicked shall be on him.<WH7563>

But if the wicked<WH7563> turn<WH7725> from all his sins<WH2403> that he has committed,<WH6213> and keep<WH8104> all my statutes,<WH2708> and do<WH6213> that which is lawful<WH4941> and right,<WH6666> he shall surely<WH2421> live,<WH2421> he shall not die.<WH4191>
None of his transgressions<WH6588> that he has committed<WH6213> shall be remembered<WH2142> against him:<WH6666> in his righteousness that he has done<WH6213> he shall live.<WH2421>

Have I any<WH2654> pleasure<WH2654> in the death<WH4194> of the wicked?<WH7563> says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh;<WH3069> and not rather that he should return<WH7725> from his way,<WH1870> and live?<WH2421>

But when the righteous<WH6662> turns away<WH7725> from his righteousness,<WH6666> and commits<WH6213> iniquity,<WH5766> and does<WH6213> according to all the abominations<WH8441> that the wicked<WH7563> man does,<WH6213> shall he live?<WH2425> None of his righteous<WH6666> deeds that he has done<WH6213> shall be remembered:<WH2142> in his trespass<WH4603> that he has trespassed,<WH4604> and in his sin<WH2403> that he has sinned,<WH2398> in them shall he die.<WH4191>

Yet you say,<WH559> The way<WH1870> of the Lord<WH136> is not equal.<WH8505> Hear<WH8085> now,<WH1004> house of Israel:<WH3478> Is my way<WH1870> not equal?<WH8505> Aren't<WH1870> your ways unequal?<WH8505>

When the righteous<WH6662> man turns away<WH7725> from his righteousness,<WH6666> and commits<WH6213> iniquity,<WH5766> and dies<WH4191> therein;<WH5766> in his iniquity that he has done<WH6213> shall he die.<WH4191>

Again,<WH7563> when the wicked man turns away<WH7725> from his wickedness<WH7564> that he has committed,<WH6213> and does<WH6213> that which is lawful<WH4941> and right,<WH6666> he shall save<WH2421> his soul<WH5315> alive.<WH2421>
Because he considers,<WH7200> and turns away<WH7725> from all his transgressions<WH6588> that he has committed,<WH6213> he shall surely<WH2421> live,<WH2421> he shall not die.<WH4191>

Yet the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> says,<WH559> "The way<WH1870> of the Lord<WH136> is not fair.<WH8505>" House<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> aren't<WH1870> my ways fair?<WH8505> Aren't<WH1870> your ways unfair?<WH8505>

Therefore I will judge<WH8199> you,<WH1004> house of Israel,<WH3478> everyone<WH376> according to his ways,<WH1870> says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh.<WH3069> Return,<WH7725> and turn<WH7725> yourselves from all your transgressions;<WH6588> so iniquity<WH5771> shall not be your ruin.<WH4383>

Cast away<WH7993> from you all your transgressions,<WH6588> in which you have transgressed;<WH6586> and make<WH6213> yourself a new<WH2319> heart<WH3820> and a new<WH2319> spirit:<WH7307> for why will you die,<WH4191> house<WH1004> of Israel?<WH3478>
For I have no pleasure<WH2654> in the death<WH4194> of him who dies,<WH4191> says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH136> therefore turn<WH7725> yourselves,<WH2421> and live.
